    • Method Detail

      • innerTopLeft

        public Coord innerTopLeft(Dim outer,
                          Dim inner,
                          Coord topLeft)

        Given the size of the cell (outer), the size of the contents (inner), and the top-left corner of the inside of the cell, what should the top-left corner of the contents be?

        @param outer the inside dimension after taking cell borders and padding into account @param inner the size of the cell contents @param topLeft the coordinate of the top-left corner of the cell inside the borders and padding.

      • leftOffset

        public float leftOffset(float outerWidth,
                        float innerWidth)

        How far from the left do we need to start for this alignment?

      • topOffset

        public float topOffset(float outerHeight,
                       float innerHeight)

        How far from the top do we need to start for this alignment?
